rows.label: tev900193_MSG0010
rows.name:
...I've got an emergency.
I need your honest opinion, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0020
rows.name:
Here's the situation: Leesh had some
Earth-grown tea leaves squirreled away,
which I...kinda...mistook for coffee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0030
rows.name:
That's my mistake, and I copped to it.
But when I told her I put them through the
percolator, she nearly tore my head off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0040
rows.name:
...That concludes the summary.
Now, be honest: am I the asshole?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_JNK0050
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: tev900193_SEL0060
rows.name: Agree that Liesel is the asshole.

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0070
rows.name: Ugh... So an impartial observer agrees...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0080
rows.name:
I just thought that coffee and black tea
were basically the same. But I guess
ignorance is no defense...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_JNK0090
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: tev900193_SEL0100
rows.name: Insist that Alicia is the asshole.

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0110
rows.name: Right?! She was out of line![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0120
rows.name:
For starters, if you put tea leaves next to
the coffee machine, it's just asking for
trouble! Anyone could've mixed them up![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0130
rows.name:
It's not as if the tea ended up
tasting any different, anyway!
I don't see what the big deal was![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0140
rows.name:
I tried to explain all that to her, but it only
made her even more angry. I guess it was
already too late to calm her down...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0150
rows.name:
Still, I have to find some way
to mollify her. ...And fast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0160
rows.name:
Sorry about the barrage of questions,
but do you know of any foolproof means
of achieving some form of absolution?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_JNK0170
rows.name: Suggest a Present

rows.label: tev900193_SEL0180
rows.name:
Recommend she give Alicia
something she likes.

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0190
rows.name: Something she likes, huh...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0200
rows.name:
Well, that would be...more black tea.
She drinks tea every day at the same time,
that's how much of a tea maniac she is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0210
rows.name:
If I give her the wrong thing—
or God forbid, teabags—it'll be over.
She'll hate me forever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0220
rows.name:
...What? You have a xeno acquaintance
who trades in rare goods?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0230
rows.name:
I see! They might be able to procure some
tea leaves that would meet Alicia's frankly
excessively stringent standards![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0240
rows.name:
Please, introduce me!
I'll pay whatever it takes!
To them, and to you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_JNK0250
rows.name: Suggest Prostration

rows.label: tev900193_SEL0260
rows.name:
Recommend she prostrate herself before Alicia
and beg for forgiveness for at least five days.

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0270
rows.name:
Prostrate myself...? Like, putting my head
on the floor and everything? I've only
seen samurai do that in movies...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0280
rows.name:
I-I can't do something like that—
it's humiliating! ...Or wait, I guess
that's the whole point, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0290
rows.name:
...I'll do it. I'll spend weeks on the floor,
if it means that Leesh will forgive me...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_JNK0300
rows.name: Suggest a Bear Hug

rows.label: tev900193_SEL0310
rows.name:
Recommend she say nothing and
simply give Alicia a good squeeze.

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0320
rows.name: ...You can't be serious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0330
rows.name:
You're seriously suggesting I constrict
her movement until she can't shout
at me anymore...?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0340
rows.name:
...Well, I mean, my chokehold is pretty
effective, so I probably could take her
down in a matter of minutes...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0350
rows.name:
But that wouldn't be an apology,
it'd be a declaration of war!
Please don't mess with me like this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0360
rows.name:
No, the situation is dire.
The ends justify the means...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev900193_MSG0370
rows.name:
No more roundabout approaches:
I will fall to the floor and keep apologizing
until she forgives me![ST:wait ]
